title: [HOLD for payment 2024-10-14] [$125] Add "clear" button to saved search name field
issue_repo_steps:

html_description:
## Problem Saved searches often have super long names, so when users go to rename them, it's cumbersome to clear the name input. ![CleanShot 2024-10-03 at 10 27 02@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/ad9ec786-b539-4b9f-96c2-e0b1a84d6d26) ## Solution Let's add the "clear" button that we added to the Group name input to solve the same problem. ![CleanShot 2024-10-03 at 10 27 52@2x](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/61e0d2b4-ec3c-4610-8a60-e078ae68a613) ### Notes - The clear button for the saved search name field should look and function identically to the one in the group name field. cc @Expensify/design @roryabraham
